Articles.Content: the pilot did not notice that you had punched through the sound barrier?

So, for various reasons (i.e., a boyfriend living rent-free inside my head in the best of ways; an as-yet fruitless but tiring search for employment; and SOMEONE'S really bad habit of disappearing from FB chat right when I need help with technological details) the fanfic is under a delay. It will get written, however. Eventually. I promise. Until then, flatter Chobit's artwork constantly, so I don't have to deal with the whining all alone

I kid, Chobit.

I'll be waiting.

And keeping the thread on topic.

I'll be waiting.

And keeping the thread on topic.

Someone should. Goodness knows, we aren't... xD

I'm going to do my usual tactic of cover the ****tyness with a ton of shadow, blur, foggy mist and clever lighting. Don't expect much from this image

Call it your first foray into Impressionism. No one will know the difference! Except you and me, but I can keep a secret.

Wait.... did I just parody Bokusatsu Tenshi Dokuro-chan??? o.o

I was just thinking that it was very well played, and surprisingly relevant too since it is your solution to all these boyfriend related delays.

does that have a half meter stick on the back? and ontopic, dont play Bioshock, it will take up your time.

What is call On Topic seems a bit Off Topic.

What I don't understand is why she made a drawing of her "doing some deeds", while she neglects my request! But I can totally understand. I can bring out the omnipotence quote again to show why Chobit is almighty.

Anyway, any previews on upcoming new pics? Especially the one with the rocket on the side? I like that one.

lol, BF,GF issues....been more focused on other things I have, thinking my logic (avoid such relations till after/end of college) was good I am. (sorry sounding a bit Vulcan/Yoda I am)
